articles.title: Toyota reveals new name, upgraded tech for its sole U.S. EV - CNBC
articles.description: Toyota's redesigned EV will be called the "bZ" and offer notable increases in EV technologies and capabilities.
articles.content:
Toyota Motor on Tuesday revealed a redesigned version of its sole all-electric vehicle in the U.S., with a simplified name and notable increases in EV technologies and capabilities.
